attributes.action: enact the 2002 recommendations to introduce Temporary Blue Badges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Commission for Integrated Transport accepted there was a case for the Blue Badge Parking Scheme for Disabled People to be updated, so that temporarily disabled people with the same mobility problems as those who were permanently disabled should be issued with a Blue Badge whilst awaiting treatment to restore their mobility, provided that strict controls be brought in on the issue and use of such badges.
